analysis.description: Halo3DShrimpFarmer._isContract (/unique_chucks/37/0x632d63a51dce16e5874fd957e57f31463ffd3926.sol#199-208) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/37/0x632d63a51dce16e5874fd957e57f31463ffd3926.sol:
	Contract Halo3DShrimpFarmer has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/37/0x632d63a51dce16e5874fd957e57f31463ffd3926.sol#72-74)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
